ygData.subject: Re: How to know if Anthem is really working
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s the double attack kicking in.  With it meleers like Rangers, Warriors, SK, and Paladins can vastly out damage you.  I saw that a few nights ago
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 20 Jul 1999, John Kim wrote:

> on my taunt songs (usually Chain, sometimes Lullaby or Strike)
> to pull things off other tanks. There is just no way I can
> keep up with the damage they're doing.

That's the double attack kicking in. With it meleers like Rangers,
Warriors, SK, and Paladins can vastly out damage you. I saw that a few
nights ago while in Runnyeye with a bunch of ranger guildmates of mine.
On was dual wielding combine LS and the other a BBC. The dual wielding
one was able to do about 24-36 every attack while the guy with bbc was
ranging between 32-64. A whole lot more than I could ever dish out.

Treilanin Loreweaver
